1.label: Dimming Step
1.description: Percentage of step when switch is dimming up or down (0 = instant)

2.label: Minimum Level
2.description: Minimum dimming level for attached light

3.label: LED Indicator
3.description: Turn LED indicator ON when light is ON (paddle switch only)

4.label: Invert Switch
4.description: Invert on & off on the physical switch

5.label: Auto OFF
5.description: Automatically turn switch off after this number of seconds

7.label: Association Group 3 setting
7.description: Change how devices respond when associated in group 3

8.label: Default Level (local)
8.description: Default level when light is turned on at the switch (0 = previous level)

9.label: Default Level (Z-Wave)
9.description: Default level when light is turned on via Z-Wave command (0 = previous level)

6[0x01].label: Send command on local action
6[0x01].description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?

6[0x02].label: Send command on 3-way action
6[0x02].description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?

6[0x04].label: Send command on z-wave action
6[0x04].description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?

6[0x08].label: Send command on auto off timer
6[0x08].description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?
